Welcome to Codeforces-Api

Here are our endpoints you can use it to get data from Codeforces.

  1. To get number of Accepted solutions in a specific contest from specific list:

    2. https://codeforces-api.netlify.app/.netlify/functions/ac/g/<groupId>/c/<contestId>/l/<listId>
    Codeforces contest link example:
    https://codeforces.com/group/MWSDmqGsZm/contest/219158/standings?list=39542a7f25fda1875082a7bd25b56ccf
    Your API Call:
    https://codeforces-api.netlify.app/.netlify/functions/ac/g/MWSDmqGsZm/c/219158/l/39542a7f25fda1875082a7bd25b56ccf
